name: spotify-player
title: Spotify Player
description: Spotify's most common features, now at your fingertips. Search for music and podcasts, browse your library, and control the playback. Glance at what's currently playing directly from the menu bar.
author: mattisssa

preferences.name: closeWindowOnAction
preferences.description: If enabled, the Raycast window will be closed after performing an action
preferences.label: Close window on action

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: A single unified search command. Search for artists, albums, songs, playlists, podcasts, and episodes. Use the dropdown menu to filter your search to a specific category. Each category offers contextual actions, so you can dive deeper into the search.

preferences.title: Filters
preferences.label: Music Only
preferences.description: Only show results for music. Podcasts and episodes are excluded.
preferences.name: musicOnly

preferences.title: Top View
preferences.description: Show a specific view at the top of the results list by default
preferences.name: topView

commands.name: yourLibrary
commands.title: Your Library
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See your saved artists, albums, songs, playlists, and podcasts. Similar to the "Search" command, it includes a category dropdown and contextual actions.

preferences.title: Default View
preferences.description: Open a specific view by default
preferences.name: Default-View

commands.name: nowPlaying
commands.title: Now Playing
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See what's currently playing. Use the actions (âŒ˜ K) for further actions, such as Play/Pause, Like/Dislike, Skip, Start Radio, Add to Playlist, Connect Device and more.

commands.name: nowPlayingMenuBar
commands.title: Menu Bar Player
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See what's currently playing in your Menu Bar. Click for further actions, such as Play/Pause, Like/Dislike, Skip, Start Radio, Add to Playlist, Connect Device and more. Refreshes every 10 seconds.

preferences.name: hideIconWhenIdle
preferences.description: If enabled, the icon in the Menu Bar will be hidden when Spotify is not running or when nothing is playing
preferences.label: Hide icon when idle

preferences.name: hideArtistName
preferences.description: If enabled, the artist's name will be hidden in the Menu Bar
preferences.label: Hide artist's name

preferences.name: cleanupTitle
preferences.description: If enabled cleans up extra info like remix titles or versions from the song name
preferences.label: Cleanup song title

preferences.name: maxTextLength
preferences.title: Now Playing Text Length
preferences.description: Maximum number of characters to show for the currently playing track in the menu bar. Leave empty to use default (30 characters)

preferences.name: iconType
preferences.title: Menu Bar Icon
preferences.description: Choose between the default Spotify icon, or the cover image of the current track or episode.

commands.name: togglePlayPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Toggle the playback of the current song.

commands.name: addPlayingSongToPlaylist
commands.title: Add Playing Song to Playlist
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Adds the current song to a playlist of your choice.

preferences.name: duplicateSongCheck
preferences.description: Prevents duplicate song addition. Significantly slows performance of non cached playlists.
preferences.label: Check for duplicate songs

preferences.name: cacheRefreshTime
preferences.title: Cache Refresh Rate
preferences.description: How often to refresh cached playlists

commands.name: removeSongFromPlaylist
commands.title: Remove Playing Song from Playlist
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Remove the current song from a playlist of your choice.

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skip to the next song/episode.

commands.name: previous
commands.title: Previous
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skip to the previous song/episode.

commands.name: like
commands.title: Like
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Like the current song.

commands.name: dislike
commands.title: Dislike
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Dislike the current song.

commands.name: devices
commands.title: Select Device
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Select a device to play music on.

commands.name: volume
commands.title: Set Volume
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Set the volume to an arbitrary percent.

commands.name: volume0
commands.title: Set Volume to 0%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Mute the volume.

commands.name: volume25
commands.title: Set Volume to 25%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Set the volume to 25%.

commands.name: volume50
commands.title: Set Volume to 50%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Set the volume to 50%.

commands.name: volume75
commands.title: Set Volume to 75%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Set the volume to 75%.

commands.name: volume100
commands.title: Set Volume to 100%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Set the volume to 100%.

commands.name: volumeDown
commands.title: Turn Volume Down
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Turn the volume down by 10%.

commands.name: volumeUp
commands.title: Turn Volume Up
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Turn the volume up by 10%.

commands.name: toggleShuffle
commands.title: Toggle Shuffle
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Toggle shuffle.

commands.name: cycleRepeat
commands.title: Cycle Repeat
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Cycle the repeat state between off, context (meaning the current playlist/album), and track.

commands.name: replay
commands.title: Replay
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Replay the current song/episode form the beginning.

commands.name: current-track
commands.title: Current Track
commands.description: Show the current song/episode state.

commands.name: startRadio
commands.title: Start Radio
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Start a radio station based on the current song.

commands.name: copyUrl
commands.title: Copy URL
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Copy the URL of the current song/episode.

commands.name: copyArtistAndTitle
commands.title: Copy Artist And Title
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Copy the artist and track title of the current song/episode

commands.name: justPlay
commands.title: Just Play
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Quickly start playing a song based on your query.

commands.name: queue
commands.title: Queue
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See your queue.

commands.name: generatePlaylist
commands.title: Generate Playlist
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Generate a Spotify playlist using Raycast AI.

commands.name: startDJ
commands.title: Start DJ
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Start the DJ.

commands.name: copyEmbed
commands.title: Copy Embed Code
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Copy the iframe embed code for the currently playing song or podcast episode.

commands.name: skip15
commands.title: Skip 15 Seconds
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skip 15 seconds forward in an episode.

commands.name: back15
commands.title: Back 15 Seconds
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Back 15 seconds in an episode.

commands.name: findLyrics
commands.title: Find Lyrics
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Find and display lyrics for the currently playing song from Genius.

tools.name: search
tools.title: Search
tools.description: Search for music and podcasts on Spotify. Get Spotify catalog information about albums, artists, playlists, tracks, shows, episodes or audiobooks that match a keyword string.

tools.name: play
tools.title: Play
tools.description: Play a song or episode on Spotify.

tools.name: get-current-user
tools.title: Get Current User
tools.description: Get detailed profile information about the current user (including the current user's username).

tools.name: add-track-to-playlist
tools.title: Add Track to Playlist
tools.description: Adds a track to a playlist

tools.name: queue
tools.title: Queue
tools.description: Add tracks to queue and get the current queue state
